content.text:
# Hounslow East (ward)

Hounslow East is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Hounslow. The ward was first used in the 1964 elections and elects two councillors to Hounslow London Borough Council.
Geography
The ward is named after the suburb of Hounslow.
